member.name: M:PagedList.EntityFramework.PagedListExtensions.ToPagedListAsync``1(System.Linq.IQueryable{``0},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a subset of this collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index and containing metadata about the collection of objects the subset was created from.
member.typeparam: The type of object the collection should contain.
member.param: The collection of objects to be divided into subsets. If the collection implements , it will be treated as such.
The one-based index of the subset of objects to be contained by this instance.
The maximum size of any individual subset.
member.returns: A subset of this collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index and containing metadata about the collection of objects the subset was created from.
